creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: three white paneled huipil woven on a back strap loom; brocaded with vertical zigzag brocaded lightning designs (blue, purple and green stripes); yellow dots spread on the purple background represent human eyes in the darkness
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
